content: Hello! Might be a Basic Question but I am looking for a valid coding system for user logins. E.g. single sign on users for enterprise. Can anyone point me in the right direction? Thanks!
typically this is done using OAuth, some enterprises back this with SAML and/or LDAP directories.
NHS Digital are developing NHS ID. Currently trialled withLondon Ambulance Service. Using OAuth & FIDO to replace/compliment NHS Smartcards
